name: Enlightenment
description: Investigate the source of the rot in the Moku'ah Jungle.

rewards.text: You get Infection, you have now unlocked access to the Nyra Beach.

name: Curiousity
description: Investigate Nyra for evidence of the scholar.

rewards.text: You get Solifey Stone, you have now unlocked access to the Volcano

name: Royalty
description: Investigate the Moku'ah Volcano and find the old king.

rewards.text: You get Heart of the Volcano, you have now unlocked the Wall of Ice.

name: Love
description: Find answers at the edge of the Isfjall tundra.

rewards.text: You get Esophial, you have now unlocked 100% waterbreathing skill.
